summary: The Hospital Inpatient Services Modernization Act (H.R. 4313) aims to extend acute hospital care at home waiver flexibilities under the Social Security Act until 2030. It mandates a subsequent study to analyze the criteria, quality, costs, and outcomes of this initiative, comparing it to traditional inpatient care. The study will cover factors like health outcomes, readmission rates, costs, and patient experience, with a report due to congressional committees by September 30, 2028.
